reasons: FastAgent framework chosen for minimal boilerplate and rapid agent development
GitHub Actions selected as runtime platform for reliable, auditable automation with built-in scheduling
MCP Protocol adopted to standardize integrations with external services like Gmail
Taskfile used to provide consistent development workflows across all agents
Decentralized ownership model implemented to give individuals control over their own automation
Human-in-the-loop design maintained to preserve user decision-making authority
Individual context emphasis ensures agents align with personal workflows rather than generic defaults
Composable architecture enables building complex workflows from lightweight, reusable components
JSON Schema foundation provides structured, parseable AI outputs for reliable automation
Two-context organization (@Home/@Work) separates personal and professional automation concerns
